Easily. Her mommy thing is gross and creepy, 90% of the time her ridiculously oversized tits are drawn terribly, and even if you deliberately avoid the doujins with her she has an annoying tendency to show up in doujins about other girls. I haven't played the game so for all I know she's got a beautiful moving backstory with character depth comparable to the Mariana Trench, but in hentai she's an annoying, flat character who exists only to satisfy people with an Oedipus complex. That being said I try not to judge others fetishes as long as I'm not involved. If you want to whack off to Raiko feel free to. Just keep her the hell away from my Shuten Douji dojins, thank you very much.
